thread.section_title: The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, location, location AND value
thread.title_full: Location, location, location AND value - Review of The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Joe T
title: Location, location, location AND value
text:
Stayed here with 2 friends for 3 days last year, and well as per the subject of this review the location was perfect!!! 1 minute walk from Times Square which was extremely useful.
The hotel itself was good value for money. We paid 90 a night for 2 doubles in a room room (extremely cheap particularly when there is 3/4 people). Rooms were clean and a decent size, and we were lucky enough to have a street view which was a lovely touch!
Would absolutely recommend for a budget trip looking for a good central hotel.
